name: Burrito Cat Destroyer
description: there are evil burrito cats in space and u gotta DESTROY THEM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! u have super awesome laser powers and u click the space bar to shoot EPIC LASER at the burrito cats. watch out tho cuz u only have 1 LIFE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! if u get hit by the evil cat lasers or the evil cats touch u, u will LOSE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
